short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Message by Extract LinkedIn profiles and messages from uploaded CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension streamlines your LinkedIn outreach by allowing you to send personalized messages directly to LinkedIn profiles. Simply upload a CSV file containing LinkedIn profile URLs and custom message fields, and the extension will automatically extract the details to send messages to each profile. Ideal for recruiters, sales professionals, and networkers looking to save time while engaging with contacts.
